channel.title: The Safehouse News
channel.description: The Rogue Community site for all your MMORPG news!!

item.title: Vanguard Begins Beta 4
item.description:
With Beta 4 Sigil has opened all starting cities and has testers playing on all three continents. Intercontinental travel, thousands of new plots and gameplay involving player housing are also in play.

Is a definite release date announcement coming soon?

Related News: Safehouse Vanguard Weekly Beta Giveaway Threads, see the Safehouse Vanguard Forums for details.

item.title: Vanguard Beta Giveaway Thread 2
item.description:
We got some great participation on the first thread even though we didn't let it run for a whole week in order to offer you more chances at a Beta slot this month. This thread is also a "short" one since it will only go from today until Sunday, midnight PST, but it should be just as fun.

The questions for this thread are:
1. What was the first MMORPG you ever played?
2. Have you ever played more than one MMORPG at a time?

Hit "Discuss this Story" to leave your reply. There are no wrong answers but the questions are discussion seeds so feel free to add information and respond to others' posts if you like.

Same rules apply as for the last Vanguard Beta Giveaway thread, a winner will be chosen at random from those who have replied to this thread by the deadline (Sunday, December 17th, Midnight, PST). One entry chance per person regardless of how many posts are made in the thread. Winner will be notified via the private message system. Beta spot will be subject to Vanguard Beta guidelines.

item.title: Firefly to go Massively Multiplayer
item.description:
Recently Multiverse and Fox announced that they would create a Massively Multiplayer game based on the Firefly TV series.

Here is Multiverse's press release.

item.title: Vanguard Weekly Beta Giveaway Threads
item.description:
Vanguard was just announced as ready for pre-order but you can start playing sooner by getting into the Beta. We've got a beta slot a week to give out so we're going to make this easy on everyone.

Each week we're going to have a forum thread with an easy "no wrong answer" type question. Post your answer in the thread and you get a shot at that week's beta slot.

item.title: Vanguard Pre-Order: In Stores Now!
item.description: Sony Online Entertainment and Sigil Games Online today announced the arrival of “Vanguard: Saga of Heroes” pre-order boxes in select retailers. The boxes should be available starting December 5th, depending on the retailer...

item.title: Issue 8: "To Protect and Serve" Goes Live
item.description:
Today Cryptic launched City of Heroes' eighth update, "To Protect and Serve".  Heroes now get Safeguard Missions where they help to prevent villains from wreaking havoc on Paragon City, a Police Band feature similar to CoV's newspaper missions, and a revamp of Faultine, one of Paragon City's Zones.

Improvements available to both City of Heroes and City of Villains are Pocket D Arenas and the Veteran Rewards program.

item.title: Nvidia Launches Fastest Card on the Planet
item.description:
Today nVidia released the GeForce 8800 graphics processors, and there's no doubt that both the 8800GTX and 8800GTS are very fast cards.

They usher in DirectX 10, unified shaders, and shader model 4.0, but as there are currently no Dx10 benchmarks or games they must be judged (for now) on their Dx9 capabilities.  In that area they pass with flying colors.

Here are a few of the reviews from the web:

The Tech Report

HardOCP

Tom's Hardware

ExtremeTech

FiringSquad

item.title: Vanguard Pricing Released
item.description:
Sigil has released pricing and content information for Vanguard! There will be a Pre-Order, Regular Edition and Collector's & Guild Edition.


Regular Edition - $49.99 MSRP

Collector’s & Guild Edition Details - $89.99 MSRP

Read on for details.

item.title: Cryptic, Microsoft, and Marvel announce 'Marvel Universe Online'
item.description:
As per the press release on Cryptic Studio's website:

Today at X06, Xbox’s annual official industry event in Barcelona, Spain, Microsoft Game Studios announced further details around its eagerly awaited project based on the Marvel universe of Super Heroes. Microsoft and Marvel Entertainment confirmed that Cryptic Studios has been named the developer of “Marvel Universe Online,” the highly anticipated massively multiplayer online (MMO) video game exclusive to Xbox 360 and Windows Vista.

item.title: A Day in The Life of a Vanguard Beta Rogue
item.description:
Hello rogues. Just wanted to let you all know that the rogue is alive and well in Vanguard:Saga of Heroes. Under Brad McQuaid's nod of approval, I offer up a quick glimpse at the Vanguard rogue. Hopefully with more to follow.

A Day in the Life of a Vanguard Rogue
